summary: WWE is an American company that puts on professional wrestling shows. It was started in 1953 and has changed names a few times. WWE is now owned by a bigger company called TKO Group Holdings. They have shows like *Raw* and *SmackDown* that are watched by people all over the world. WWE also makes movies and has other businesses. Even though it looks like real fighting, it's actually scripted and planned to entertain people. In 2023, WWE merged with UFC and went through some leadership changes.
title: WWE
